product_name: Zoot Performance Tri BYOB Racesuit - Women's
long_description: The Zoot Performance Tri BYOB Racesuit for women keeps up with you whether you're training or racing. It provides essential support and function to help you reach your goals. Compressive hem offers targeted muscle support to help reduce muscle fatigue; 4-way stretch offers unrestricted range of motion. Moisture-wicking, quick-drying fabric offers UPF 50+ sun protection; reflective details keep you visible. Mesh panels at side, back and bra lining offer enhanced breathability. BYOB (Bring-Your-Own-Bra) design lets you customize the fit. 12 in. zipper allows ventilation control. Integra SBR 1D tri chamois pad construction. The Zoot Performance Tri BYOB Racesuit for women has hip pockets to keep your nutrition stash close and organized.
short_description: The Zoot Performance Tri BYOB Racesuit for women keeps up with you whether you're training or racing. It provides essential support and function to help you reach your goals.
